title: Question 1
prompt: Which sentence best summarizes the play’s plot?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
The plot of the play is told in the first paragraph of the reading. This paragraph gives a number of important points that give a good overview of the plot: that there is a murder, that the characters are snowed in, and that it takes place at a hotel. These important points are summarized in the sentence: A murder occurs among a group of people stranded at a hotel during a snowstorm.


The Mousetrap is a story of a young couple starting off on their new life as hotel owners. They are snowed in with four guests and a mysterious stranger, who has crashed his car in the snow. A detective arrives to warn the party of a potential murderer, and soon one of the guests is killed.
